properties.name: DeleteOnTermination
properties.description: Whether to delete the network interface when the instance terminates. By default, this value is set to true.

type.description: Whether to delete the network interface when the instance terminates. By default, this value is set to true.

properties.name: DeviceIndex
properties.description: The network interface's position in the attachment order. For example, the first attached network interface has a DeviceIndex of 0.

type.description: The network interface's position in the attachment order. For example, the first attached network interface has a DeviceIndex of 0.

properties.name: InstanceId
properties.description: The ID of the instance to which you will attach the ENI.

type.description: The ID of the instance to which you will attach the ENI.

properties.name: NetworkInterfaceId
properties.description: The ID of the ENI that you want to attach.

type.description: The ID of the ENI that you want to attach.

properties.name: AttachmentId
properties.description: The ID of the network interface attachment.

type.description: The ID of the network interface attachment.
